response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. It's not every day that one comes across such a valuable item, and I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Given its worth to you, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional product. I am confident that this offer strikes a balance between fair value and maximizing my earnings.
